description.value:
You gain the ability to move or manipulate creatures or objects by thought.

Utility Spell

  • For the duration, you may use an Action to attempt to move or manipulate one creature or object that you can see within range.

  • You may only affect one target at a time.

  • You may move a creature that is Huge or smaller. The creature must make a Strength save; if it fails, you move the creature up to 30 feet in any direction, including suspending it in mid-air. If you succeed in moving the creature, it is Restrained until the end of your next turn.

  • On subsequent turns, if you have restrained a creature, you may use your Action to force another Strength save to keep it in your grip.

  • You may move an object that weighs up to 1000 pounds up to 30 feet in any direction.

  • If you attempt to move an object that is worn or carried by a creature, that creature must make a Strength save; if it fails, you pull the object away from the creature.

  • You can exert fine control on objects with your telekinetic grip, such as manipulating a simple tool, opening a door or a container, stowing or retrieving an item from an open container, or pouring the contents from a vial.
